com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.EntityWorld
      • com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateEventListener

    public final class GameWorld
extends EntityWorld
implements UpdateEventListener
    Represents pure logical state of game. Manages all entities and their state.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

        Parameters:
        predicate - filter
        Returns:
        new list containing entities that satisfy query filters

        Parameters:

        predicate - filter

      • getEntitiesByType

        public List<Entity> getEntitiesByType(Enum<?>... types)
        This query only works on entities with TypeComponent. If called with no arguments, all entities are returned. Warning: object allocation.
        Parameters:
        types - entity types
        Returns:
        new list containing entities that satisfy query filters

      • getEntitiesByType

        public void getEntitiesByType(Array<Entity> result,
                              Enum<?>... types)
        GC-friendly version of getEntitiesByType(Enum[]).
        Parameters:
        result - the array to collect entities
        types - entity types

      • getEntitiesInRange

        public List<Entity> getEntitiesInRange(javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D selection)
        Returns a list of entities which are partially or entirely in the specified rectangular selection. This query only works on entities with BoundingBoxComponent. Warning: object allocation.
        Parameters:
        selection - Rectangle2D that describes the selection box
        Returns:
        new list containing entities that satisfy query filters

      • getEntitiesInRange

        public void getEntitiesInRange(Array<Entity> result,
                               double minX,
                               double minY,
                               double maxX,
                               double maxY)
        GC-friendly version of getEntitiesInRange(Rectangle2D).
        Parameters:
        result - the array to collect entities
        minX - min x
        minY - min y
        maxX - max x
        maxY - max y

      • getCollidingEntities

        public List<Entity> getCollidingEntities(Entity entity)
        Returns a list of entities which colliding with given entity. Note: CollidableComponent is not considered. This query only works on entities with BoundingBoxComponent.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity
        Returns:
        new list containing entities that satisfy query filters

      • getCollidingEntities

        public void getCollidingEntities(Array<Entity> result,
                                 Entity entity)
        GC-friendly version of getCollidingEntities(Entity).
        Parameters:
        result - the array to collect entities
        entity - the entity

      • getEntitiesByLayer

        public List<Entity> getEntitiesByLayer(RenderLayer layer)
        Returns a list of entities which have the given render layer index. This query only works on entities with MainViewComponent.
        Parameters:
        layer - render layer
        Returns:
        new list containing entities that satisfy query filters

      • getEntitiesByLayer

        public void getEntitiesByLayer(Array<Entity> result,
                               RenderLayer layer)
        GC-friendly version of getEntitiesByLayer(RenderLayer).
        Parameters:
        result - the array to collect entities
        layer - render layer

      • getClosestEntity

        public Optional<Entity> getClosestEntity(Entity entity,
                                         Predicate<Entity> filter)
        Returns the closest entity to the given entity with given filter. The given entity itself is never returned.

        If there no entities satisfying the requirement, Optional.empty() is returned. Warning: object allocation.

        Parameters:
        entity - selected entity
        filter - requirements
        Returns:
        closest entity to selected entity with type

      • getEntityAt

        public Optional<Entity> getEntityAt(javafx.geometry.Point2D position)
        Returns an entity at given position. The position x and y must equal to entity's position x and y.

        Returns Optional.empty() if no entity was found at given position. This query only works on entities with PositionComponent.

        Parameters:
        position - point in the world
        Returns:
        entity at point

      • getEntityByID

        public Optional<Entity> getEntityByID(String name,
                                      int id)
        Returns an entity whose IDComponent matches given name and id.

        Returns Optional.empty() if no entity was found with such combination. This query only works on entities with IDComponent.

        Parameters:
        name - entity name
        id - entity id
        Returns:
        entity that matches the query or Optional.empty()
